question: What is the safest interpretation of the chart about Grains Consumption, Pet Adoption, and Social Media?

options.A: Q4 has higher social media shares than Q3 in absolute numbers.
options.B: Q3 might have a higher Pet Adoption amount than Q4 this year.
options.C: Q1 has the highest grains consumption in absolute amount this year.
options.D: Combining pet adoptions and shares yields a sensible overall index.

explanation: A 100% stacked chart normalizes unrelated categories to 100% within each quarter. Thus, it allows comparison of composition shares but not absolute quantities, nor can categories be aggregated across groups to form a composite index.
